Patterns.Name: AbandonedBabyBottomPattern
Patterns.About: Three candle chart formation that has a solid track record of being an accurate bullish reversal pattern.

Patterns.Name: AdvanceBlockPattern
Patterns.About: Bearish reversal pattern made up of three consecutive bullish candles.

Patterns.Name: DeliberationPattern
Patterns.About: The Deliberation candlestick pattern is closely related to the Advanced Block pattern.

Patterns.Name: DownsideGapThreePattern
Patterns.About: The Downside Gap 3 candlestick pattern is very similar to the Downside Tasuki Gap pattern, with one minor difference.

Patterns.Name: DownsideTasukiGapPattern
Patterns.About: This pattern is a three candle pattern that in theory acts as a bearish continuation pattern.

Patterns.Name: EveningDojiStarPattern
Patterns.About: The Evening Doji Star candlestick pattern formation is one of the better performing three candle patterns out there.

Patterns.Name: IdenticalThreeCrowsPattern
Patterns.About: The Identical 3 Crows candlestick pattern is a three-candle bearish reversal pattern signifying a change in trend.

Patterns.Name: MorningStarDojiPattern
Patterns.About: This three candle pattern formation is a bullish reversal pattern with a solid history of performing well.

Patterns.Name: MorningStarPattern
Patterns.About: This pattern is similar to the Morning Doji Star candle pattern with the exception of the middle candle.
